ResourceHeader.Description: Bennington (BENN) Magnetometer Station is located in Bennington, Nebraska, USA.  It is one of the nine magnetometers of the Mid-continent MAgnetoseismic Chain (McMAC).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The operation of the Bennington fluxgate magnetometer is managed by University of Nebraska Lincoln.

InformationURL.Name: McMAC Bennington Station
InformationURL.Description: Information about the McMAC Bennington Ground Magnetometer Station
